title: Relates to the purchase, sale or installation of salvaged high-intensity discharge headlamps
summary: Relates to the purchase, sale, or installation of salvaged high-intensity discharge headlamps; requires records to be kept regarding used HID lights including what vehicle they are taken from and the identification of the owner of such vehicle; and provides for penalties.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the purchase, sale, or installation of salvaged high-intensity discharge headlamps
